abstract: Driven column review of 2015 Lincoln MKC crossover.
lead_paragraph: The company’s new compact crossover is a commendable effort that shares an engine with the Ford Mustang.
snippet: The company’s new compact crossover is a commendable effort that shares an engine with the Ford Mustang.

headline.main: Video Review: The Lincoln MKC Is the Right Vehicle at the Right Time
headline.print_headline: Lincoln MKC: Right Vehicle at the Right Time
